parameters.description: The type of credentials authorizing the request for an access token. (Use "password")

parameters.description: Email address of the user. (Use guest@boldbi.com for this demo API)

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password of the user. (Use Demo759! for this demo API)

token_type.description: Type of token assigned by the authorization server.

ApiScheduleRequest.description: Details about the schedule passed will be added.

ExportType.description: Specifies the export type to schedule the dashboard. Valid values: `Excel` `Html` `Pdf` `Word` `PPT` `CSV`.

StartTime.description: Specifies the UTC start date-time of schedule. The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`.

NeverEnd.description:
Sets the schedule with no end when specified as true. 

 Note: By default, the NeverEnd is set to true. To set the end time for the schedule, fill the properties of either EndAfterOccurrence or EndDate; otherwise remains empty.

EndAfterOccurrence.description:
Specifies the number of occurrences after which the schedule will be completed. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will end after the completion of 5 occurrences.

EndDate.description:
Specifies the UTC end date-time of schedule after which schedule will be completed. The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`. 

 For example: If you provide the end date-time, the schedule will end when the end date-time is reached.

UserList.description: Provides the list of email addresses or user IDs to the recipients who will get the schedules.

GroupList.description: Provides the list of group IDs to the recipients in the group list who will get the schedules.

ExternalRecipientsList.description: Provides the list of email addresses to the email recipients who will get the schedules.

ScheduleType.description:
Specifies the schedule type to schedule the dashboard. Valid values: `Hourly` `Daily` `Weekly` `Monthly` `Yearly`. 

 Note: If you chose the schedule type as `Monthly`, provide a value to the MonthlySchedule property, and leave the (HourlySchedule, DailySchedule, WeeklySchedule and YearlySchedule) properties empty.

HourlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on an hourly basis.

DailySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a daily basis.

WeeklySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a weekly basis.

MonthlySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a monthly basis.

YearlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a yearly basis.

ApiHourlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on an hourly basis.

ScheduleInterval.description: Specifies the hour interval. Based on this interval the schedule will run continuously until the end time. The format should be `HH:mm`.

ApiDailySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a daily basis.

RecurrenceType.description:
Specifies the recurrence type, whether the schedule recurs every day or every working day.  Valid values: `EveryNdays` `EveryWeekday`. 

 Note: If you chose the recurrence type as EveryNdays, provide a value to the EveryNdays property, and leave the (EveryWeekday) property empty.

EveryNdays.description:
Specifies the day interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 2, the schedule recurs every 2 days.

EveryWeekday.description: For the schedule to recur every working day, set to true.

ApiWeeklySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a weekly basis.

RecurrenceWeeks.description:
Specifies the week interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 2, the schedule will recur every 2 weeks.

RecurrenceDays.description:
Specifies the list of days the schedule recurs. Valid values `Sunday` `Monday` `Tuesday` `Wednesday` `Thursday` `Friday` `Saturday`. 

 For example: If you provide `Sunday`, the schedule will recur sunday's of every 2 weeks.

ApiMonthlySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a monthly basis.

RecurrenceType.description:
Specifies the recurrence type, whether the schedule recurs on a day basis or on the customized day basis. Valid values: `DayRecurrence` `CustomRecurrence` 

 Note: If you chose the recurrence type as DayRecurrence, provide a value to the DayRecurrence property and leave the (CustomRecurrence) property empty.

DayRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the day specified on the month interval.

CustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the customized day of the specified month interval.

ApiMonthlyScheduleDayRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the day specified on the month interval.

DayInterval.description:
Specifies the number of day interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 10, the schedule will recur every 10th day.

MonthInterval.description:
Specifies the number of month interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 3, the schedule will recur 10th day of every 3 months.

ApiMonthlyScheduleCustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the customized day of the specified month interval.

WeekOfMonth.description:
Specifies the week of the month the schedule recurs. Valid values: `first` `second` `third` `fourth` `last`. 

 For example: If you provide second, the schedule will recur on the second week.

DayOfWeek.description:
Specifies the day of the week the schedule recurs. Valid values: `day` `weekday` `weekendday` `Sunday` `Monday` `Tuesday` `Wednesday` `Thursday` `Friday` `Saturday`. 

 For example: If you provide Sunday, the schedule will recur on the second week of sunday.

MonthInterval.description:
Specifies the number of month interval the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will recur second week of sunday's of every 5 months.

ApiYearlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a yearly basis.

YearInterval.description:
Specifies the number of years the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will recur every 5 years.

RecurrenceType.description:
Specifies the recurrence type, whether the schedule recurs on a month basis or on the customized month basis. Valid values: `MonthRecurrence` `CustomRecurrence`. 

 Note: If you chose the recurrence type as MonthRecurrence, provide a value to the MonthRecurrence property, and leave the (CustomRecurrence) property empty.

MonthRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the month and number of years specified in YearInterval property.

CustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs in the customized month based on the number of years provided in the YearInterval property.

ApiYearlyScheduleMonthRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs on the month and number of years specified in YearInterval property.

MonthOfYear.description:
Specifies the month the schedule recurs. Valid values: `January` `February` `March` `April` `May` `June` `July` `August` `September` `October` `November` `December`. 

 For example: If you provide April, the schedule will recur in April of every year. Here the (year) is the value provided in the YearInterval property.

DayOfMonth.description:
Specifies the day of the month the schedule recurs. 

 For example: If you provide 20, the schedule will recur 20th April of every year.  Here the (year) is the value provided in the YearInterval property.

ApiYearlyScheduleCustomRecurrence.description: The schedule recurs in the customized month based on the number of years provided in the YearInterval property.

WeekOfMonth.description:
Specifies the week of the month the schedule recurs. Valid values: `first` `second` `third` `fourth` `last`. 

 For example: If you provide second, the schedule will recur on the second week.

DayOfWeek.description:
Specifies the day of week the schedule recurs. Valid values: `day` `weekday` `weekendday` `Sunday` `Monday` `Tuesday` `Wednesday` `Thursday` `Friday` `Saturday`.

 For example: If you provide Sunday, the schedule will recur on every sunday's of the second week.

MonthOfYear.description:
Specifies the month the schedule recurs.  Valid values: `January` `February` `March` `April` `May` `June` `July` `August` `September` `October` `November` `December`. 

 For example: If you provide March, the schedule will recur on the sunday's of the second week of March every year. Here the (year) is the value provided in the YearInterval property.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

ApiUpdateScheduleRequest.description: Details about the schedule passed will be updated.

ExportType.description: Specifies the export type to schedule the report. Valid values: `Excel` `Html` `Pdf` `Word` `PPT` `CSV`.

StartTime.description: Specifies the UTC start date-time of schedule. The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`.

NeverEnd.description:
Sets the schedule with no end when specified as true. 

 Note: By default, the NeverEnd is set to true. To set the end time for schedule, fill the properties of either EndAfterOccurrence or EndDate; otherwise it remains empty.

EndAfterOccurrence.description:
Specifies the number of occurrences after which the schedule will be completed. 

 For example: If you provide 5, the schedule will end after the completion of 5 occurrences.

EndDate.description:
Specifies the UTC end date-time of schedule after which schedule will be completed. The format should be ISO 8601 i.e. `yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ssZ`. 

 For example: If you provide the end date-time, the schedule will end once the end date-time is reached.

UserList.description: Provides the list of email addresses or user IDs to the recipients who will get the schedules.

GroupList.description: Provides the list of group IDs to the recipients in the group list who will get the schedules.

ExternalRecipientsList.description: Provides the list of email addresses to the email recipients who will get the schedules.

RemoveUserList.description: Provides the list of email addresses or user IDs to remove recipients from the schedule subscriptions.

RemoveGroupList.description: Provides the list of group IDs to remove groups from the schedule subscriptions.

RemoveExternalRecipientsList.description: Provides the list of email addresses to remove email recipients from the schedule subscriptions.

ScheduleType.description:
Specifies the schedule type to schedule the dashboard. Valid values: `Hourly` `Daily` `Weekly` `Monthly` `Yearly`. 

 Note: If you chose the schedule type as `Monthly`, provide a value to the MonthlySchedule property, and leave the (HourlySchedule, DailySchedule, WeeklySchedule and YearlySchedule) property empty.

HourlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on an hourly basis.

DailySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a daily basis.

WeeklySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a weekly basis.

MonthlySchedule.description: Runs the schedule on a monthly basis.

YearlySchedule.description: Runs the schedules on a yearly basis.

IsActive.description: Returns true if the user is an active user.

UserStatus.description: Returns the status of the user.

IsActive.description: Returns true if the user is an active user.

UserStatus.description: Returns the status of the user.
